arts.ttl: Modrić scores a historic goal at the Mestalla "Breaking records is always nice"
arts.sum: In his 561st game for Real Madrid, the Croatian achieved this milestone and equalled the record of two Real Madrid legends, Pirri and Míchel. At the end of the game, the Croatian spoke to RealmadridTV and was happy to have achieved these milestones: “Breaking records is always nice.

arts.sum: Racing Club de Lens have decided to pull the plug on Brice Samba’s expected move to Ligue 1 rivals Rennes, according to a report from RMC Sport. Both clubs reached…

arts.ttl: Seko Fofana joins French club Rennes after spell in Saudi Arabia
arts.sum: The 29-year-old Fofana helped Lens to a second-place finish in Ligue 1 in 2022-23, and Rennes hopes he can provide a similar boost for the Brittany club. Ivory Coast midfielder Seko Fofana ended his brief spell in Saudi Arabia to sign a long-term contract with French club Rennes on Wednesday.
